discussionInfo.endedThisDiscussion:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading indicating that the mentor has ended the discussion.
**UI Location**: Mentoring Session -> Discussion Info (timeline entry for mentor finished)
**When Users See This**: When a mentor ends a discussion session.
**Technical Context**: Includes `mentorHandle` which must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "{{mentorHandle}} ended this discussion."
discussionInfo.itsTimeToReviewMentoring:
**Functional Purpose**: Prompt to review the mentor's performance.
**UI Location**: Mentoring Session -> Discussion Info (timeline entry for mentor finished or timed out)
**When Users See This**: When a discussion session concludes (either by mentor or by timing out).
**Technical Context**: Includes `mentorHandle` which must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "It's time to review {{mentorHandle}}'s mentoring"
discussionInfo.youllBeAbleToLeaveFeedbac:
**Functional Purpose**: Explains that feedback can be provided for the mentoring experience.
**UI Location**: Mentoring Session -> Discussion Info (timeline entry for mentor finished or timed out)
**When Users See This**: When a discussion session concludes (either by mentor or by timing out).
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "You'll be able to leave feedback and share what you thought of your experience."
discussionInfo.reviewFinishDiscussion:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text for completing the review and finishing the discussion.
**UI Location**: Mentoring Session -> Discussion Info (button after mentor finishes discussion)
**When Users See This**: When a mentor has ended the discussion and the student needs to review it.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Review & finish discussion"
discussionInfo.thisDiscussionTimedOut:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading indicating that the discussion timed out.
**UI Location**: Mentoring Session -> Discussion Info (timeline entry for timed out discussion)
**When Users See This**: When a discussion session has timed out.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "This discussion timed out."
discussionInfo.reviewDiscussion:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text for reviewing the discussion after it timed out.
**UI Location**: Mentoring Session -> Discussion Info (button after discussion times out)
**When Users See This**: When a discussion has timed out and the student needs to review it.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Review discussion"
